trans-unit.source: Retrieves RGB color table from the DIB section bitmap

seg-source.mrk: Retrieves RGB color table from the DIB section bitmap

target.mrk: Retrieves RGB color table from the DIB section bitmap

trans-unit.source: A DIB section bitmap from which to retrieve the color table.

seg-source.mrk: A DIB section bitmap from which to retrieve the color table.

target.mrk: A DIB section bitmap from which to retrieve the color table.

trans-unit.source: "dword[n]" structure that contains a color information from the DIB color table, @extended flag will contain the number of colors in this structure.

seg-source.mrk: "dword[n]" structure that contains a color information from the DIB color table, @extended flag will contain the number of colors in this structure.

target.mrk: "dword[n]" structure that contains a color information from the DIB color table, @extended flag will contain the number of colors in this structure.

trans-unit.source: The _WinAPI_GetDIBColorTable() function retrieves a color table for DIB section bitmaps that use 1, 4, or 8 bits-per-pixel.

seg-source.mrk: The _WinAPI_GetDIBColorTable() function retrieves a color table for DIB section bitmaps that use 1, 4, or 8 bits-per-pixel.

target.mrk: The _WinAPI_GetDIBColorTable() function retrieves a color table for DIB section bitmaps that use 1, 4, or 8 bits-per-pixel.

trans-unit.source: A DIB section bitmaps that use bits-per-pixel value greater than eight do not have a color table, but they do have associated color masks.

seg-source.mrk: A DIB section bitmaps that use bits-per-pixel value greater than eight do not have a color table, but they do have associated color masks.

target.mrk: A DIB section bitmaps that use bits-per-pixel value greater than eight do not have a color table, but they do have associated color masks.

trans-unit.source: Call the _WinAPI_GetObject() function to retrieve those color masks.

seg-source.mrk: Call the _WinAPI_GetObject() function to retrieve those color masks.

target.mrk: Call the _WinAPI_GetObject() function to retrieve those color masks.
